home.title: I am Anton Johansson
home.description: I am a programmer and a systems architect.
about.title: About me
about.description: I'm 28 years old, living in Borås, Sweden. I currently work for a company called Viskan System AB, which develops, maintains and supplies a E-commerce platform and an associated back-office system. I do a lot of coding during my day but I also tend to lean a lot towards the dev-ops direction, working with build pipelines and adapt applications for containerised environments.
Other than coding I like to play computer games. Currently it's mostly Apex Legends and Rocket League. Hit me up using my Steam profile!
